snippet.title: Cold VR - Official Trailer | Upload VR Showcase
snippet.description: Get ready to access the simulation and fight back. Check out the trailer for ColdVR to see various locations, see some of the threats you'll face, and learn about your objectives from this upcoming game. ColdVR will be available on Meta Quest, SteamVR, and PSVR2.
